mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hire h INNER JOIN user_company_detail u ON h.id=u.id WHERE h.hire_open ='Y'
mapper.insert: insert into hire ( id, hire_open, hire_condition, hire_educate, hire_state, hire_salary, hire_address1, hire_address2, hire_zip, hire_location, hire_workTime, hire_rank, hire_title ) values ( #{id}, #{hire_open}, #{hire_condition}, #{hire_educate}, #{hire_state}, #{hire_salary}, #{hire_address1}, #{hire_address2}, #{hire_zip}, #{hire_location}, #{hire_workTime}, #{hire_rank}, #{hire_title} )

insert into hire_apply ( hire_id, hire_apply_charge, hire_apply_department, hire_apply_phone, hire_apply_time, hire_apply_way, hire_apply_p2p ) values ( #{hire_id}, #{hire_apply_charge}, #{hire_apply_department}, #{hire_apply_phone}, #{hire_apply_time}, #{hire_apply_way}, #{hire_apply_p2p} )

( #{vo.hire_id}, #{vo.hire_info_sector}, #{vo.hire_info_count}, #{vo.hire_info_content}, #{vo.hire_info_detail}, #{vo.hire_info_want} )
